review_data.content: this place is awesome. i was not disappointed when I finally got to try the Seitan-"chnusperli", vegan version of fish & chips. (except you have to pay extra for a side salad and the side chips) so it`s not a very cheap place but worth...More

review_data.title: Super lecker
review_data.content: Nettes, urbanes Ambiente. Super leckere, vegane Auswahlen und tolle Musik (manchmal sogar live Konzerte) Echt empfehlenswert!

review_data.title: Sympathischer Streetfood-Laden mit liebevoll zubereiteten Burgern

review_data.title: Small outdoor spot for food and drinks
review_data.content: Zum Gaul is located under Hardbrucke and opposite of Prime Tower. This small spot offers cooked items on the grill, salads, a full range of beverages and more. I had one of their beers from the tap, Record (5CHF). The staff is friendly and welcoming,...More

review_data.title: Durchschnittliche Burger
review_data.content: Im Sommer ganz gemütlich zum draussen sitzen. Der Burger war aber sehr durchschnittlich: sehr fettig und Imbissbuden-mässig.

review_data.title: Best vegan meal I had in Zurich (Miglior pranzo vegano a Zurigo)

review_data.title: Simple food served outside
review_data.content: Nice little rundown corner of Zurich that looks like they're squatting on someone else's land. If you're on a budget, the food here is surprisingly good. It's basic and the staff take cigarette breaks every 15 minutes, but you'll feel like you're dining in a...More

review_data.title: A fun place to eat, good value.
review_data.content: Relaxed, open air snack bar with a difference. Good value well cooked food. Two seating areas, not all under cover. Burgers are great, Fried Fish and Salad delicious.

review_data.title: Nice place for snacks and drinks
review_data.content: We came here to have a drink. This urban open-air bar is small but stylish. The focaccia was tasty. Simple and unpretentious - good to have a bite/drink.

review_data.title: Organic, fresh, great mix of flavour
